Name: Industry Accelerators
Description: The IBM Industry Accelerators are a suite of collections of various artifacts intended to address a particular business or industry issue.

Name: Reducing Severe Weather Risk in Insurance
Description: The collection of concepts and metrics used for analysis for Insurance with weather to provide claims investigators, risk assessors, and those requiring historical claims insights into how hail has impacted their own financial stability and their customer base for a particular day in Nov 2016 when there was significant hail across the US.Â© Copyright IBM Corp. 2019, 2020.
